title: Its not lunch time, so would this just be ... with Baz?
body:
Lets chat! I already ate lunch, but its a slow(ish) Friday so lets convo! First up, happy valentines day to everyone! Go tell your loved ones (doesn't have to be romantic!) that you love them. I call my parents on Valentines day to tell them I <3 them. Pets, SO's, parents, siblings, friends, it never hurts to remind someone you care about that you, you know, care about them. 

Lets get this started, AMA!
